org.wildfly.swarm.cli

Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.swarm.cli.Options

  • public class Options
extends Object
    Options for command-line parsing. Options are matched in the order in which they are added.
    Author:
    Bob McWhirter
